剏字的基本解释

剏
chuàng
同“创1”。

剏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《廣韻》初良切，平陽，初。］
“戧1”的今字。“创1”的繁体字。
(1)创伤。
(2)伤害。
(3)砍；劈。
(4)通“瘡”。
[②]［chuàng］
［《廣韻》初亮切，去漾，初。］
亦作“刱1”。亦作“剏1”。亦作“剙1”。“创2”的繁体字。
(1)始造。
(2)初始。
(3)建造。
(4)撰写；创作。
(5)超出；扩大。
(6)惩治；警戒。
(7)同“闖”。多见于俗文学作品。
(8)通“愴”。参见“創2楚”。

Basic explanation of words
Yan
chuàng
Same as "Genesis 1."
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Guangyun" Chu Liangqi, Pingyang, Chu. ]
The present character of "戗1". Traditional characters of "创1".
(1) Trauma.
(2) Harm.
(3) Cut; split.
(4) Through "sore".
[②]［chuàng］
["Guangyun" first bright cut, go to Yang, early. ]
Also known as "刱1". Also known as "剏1". Also known as "剙1". Traditional characters of "创2".
(1) Begin to make.
(2) Initial.
(3) Construction.
(4) Compose; create.
(5) Exceed; expand.
(6) Punishment; vigilance.
(7) Same as "Chuang". Seen in popular literature.
(8) Through "Yi". See "Chuang 2 Chu".
